ygData.subject: Re: Unit 37 / Astrotrain
ygData.msgSnippet: Spinister nods, and backs away, turning his back only when he leaves the room, he is followed by Hairsplitter, as Singe salutes, and then quickly catches up.

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Spinister nods, and backs away, turning his back only when he leaves the
room, he is followed by Hairsplitter, as Singe salutes, and then quickly
catches up. Spinister leaves the buidling, and Transforms, folding into
his helicopter mode. Singe and Hairsplitter both leap up, and land on
his wings, transformed into their gun modes. His blade begins to spin,
and kicks up metalic dust, as he lifts off the ground, and roars towards
the dirtier section of the Predacon territory.
